name: Slice Of Life (itch) (Spoon)
description:
Slice Of Life

A short game about two characters, Lead and Eraser.

They both like apples.

You like them too, don't you?

So, do you prefer them sliced or whole?

Supposedly just a silly question, but what if things take a strange turn?

This game contains very bright colors, and purposefully, an ugly looking style.

Please don't play if you can't tolerate Comic Sans MS.

A few horror aspects as well.

Oh, and one last thing.

Please don't listen to Eraser if they tell you to die.
